```{r}
load("na.omit_TCGA_BRCA_methylation450_tsv_gz.Rdata") ## load the original data
```

```{r}
load("BRCA.fil.Rdata")
library("doParallel")
detectCores()
library(ChAMP)

BRCA.fil.norm <- champ.norm(beta=BRCA.fil$beta,
           resultsDir="./CHAMP_Normalization/",
           method="BMIQ",
           plotBMIQ=T,
           arraytype="450K",
           cores=4)
```


```{r}
samples.df.meth <-  as.data.frame(colnames(BRCA.fil.norm))
colnames(samples.df.meth) <- "Sample_Name"
samples.df.meth$Sample_Name <- as.character(samples.df.meth$Sample_Name)
samples.df.meth$Patient <- rapply(lapply(strsplit(samples.df.meth$Sample_Name,split = "-"),"[",1:3),f = paste,collapse = "-") ## add patient id only for matching purpose 
save(samples.df.meth,file = "samples.df.meth.Rdata")



batches.methylation$Sample_Name <- rapply(lapply(strsplit(batches.methylation$Sample,split = "-"),"[",1:4),f = paste,collapse = "-")

## check that the information we need for the sample of intewrest is present in the phenotype dataframne for the  batch effect calculation and cortecitonusing the chop methulation
```

## assess the presence of batch effects in the dats 
```{r}
library(ChAMP)
## Filter the methylation data to only keep  those with batch effect data aavail 
all(colnames(BRCA.fil.norm) == samples.df.meth$Sample_Name) ## true, therefore proceed 
samples.df.meth.fil <-  samples.df.meth[which(samples.df.meth$Sample_Name %in% batches.methylation$Sample_Name),]
BRCA.fil.norm.fil <- BRCA.fil.norm[,which(colnames(BRCA.fil.norm) %in% samples.df.meth.fil$Sample_Name)]
all(colnames(BRCA.fil.norm.fil) == samples.df.meth.fil$Sample_Name) ## true, therefore proceed 
batches.methylation.svd <- batches.methylation[,c("Sample_Name","TSS","BatchId","PlateId","ShipDate")]
## rearrange the methylatio data such that it is arranged according to the order of the samples 
batches.methylation.svd <- batches.methylation.svd[match(colnames(BRCA.fil.norm.fil), batches.methylation.svd$Sample_Name),]
save(batches.methylation.svd,file = "batches.methylation.svd.Rdata")
## check that the order of the samples is the same across the  phenotype and the methylation data
all(colnames(BRCA.fil.norm.fil) == batches.methylation.svd$Sample_Name) ## true, therefore proceed 

champ.SVD(beta = BRCA.fil.norm.fil,
              rgSet=NULL,
              pd=batches.methylation.svd,
              RGEffect=FALSE,
              PDFplot=TRUE,
              Rplot=TRUE,
              resultsDir="/home/uqmdeluc/CHAMP_SVDimages/")

BRCA.fil.norm.fil.input <- t(BRCA.fil.norm.fil) ## transform the data such that genes are now in the columns 
BRCA.fil.norm.fil.pca <- prcomp(BRCA.fil.norm.fil.input, center = TRUE,scale. = TRUE)
save(BRCA.fil.norm.fil.pca,file = "BRCA.fil.norm.fil.pca.Rdata")
```
